name: @fadroma/namada
description: Client library for Namada with WASM SDK

scripts.build:wasm:dev: wasm-pack build --dev --target web && rm -v pkg/package.json pkg/.gitignore
scripts.build:wasm:prod: wasm-pack build --release --target web && rm -v pkg/package.json pkg/.gitignore
scripts.release: time sh -c 'pnpm clean && pnpm i && pnpm check && pnpm cov all && ubik release --otp 123123'
scripts.release:fast: time sh -c 'pnpm clean && pnpm i && pnpm check && ubik release --otp 123123'
scripts.release:faster: time sh -c 'pnpm clean && pnpm i && ubik release --access public --otp 123123'
